text: Pai Brothers is a 1995 Indian Malayalam comedy film written and directed by Ali Akbar. Innocent, Jagathy Sreekumar, and Alphonsa are the main actors. The plot revolves around two middle aged brothers—Ganapathy Pai and Anantha Pai—competing to impress their newly appointed office secretary who has a liking for them, without the knowledge of their wives and children. The film's music was composed by Dev Krishna. the songs are written by O N V Kurup tuned by dev krishna ==Plot== ==Cast== * Innocent as Ganapathy Pai * Jagathy Sreekumar as Anantha Pai * Alphonsa as Mohini * K. P. A. C. Lalitha as Allu Ganapathy Pai * Kalpana as Komalam Anantha Pai * Baiju as Thrivikraman * Janardhanan as Keshavan * Sudheesh as Manu * Anila Sreekumar as Parvathy Ganapathy Pai * Zainuddin (actor) as Dr. Sundaran ==Soundtrack== The film's original music was composed by Dev Krishna, with lyrics by O. N. V. Kurup. * "Kalabhamchaarthiya" - K. S. Chitra, P. Jayachandran * "Poonilaavu Poothirangi" - K. J. Yesudas * "Pullipoonkuyil Chellapookuyil" - K. S. Chithra ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Pai Brothers
